name: In Need Of Food
description:
The year is 2056, London and the rest of the world are suffering from a food crisis as a result of our negligance od wasting food and not preserving what we have.

You are in charge of a Food Bank becuase you had seen a newspaper saying that they were hiring, You feel that you can make a difference and help people.

This is a resource management game where when giving out foood and such is heavily relied on the players moral compass. 

There are no right or wrong answers to the crisis, just what ever the player feels is correct to the way they view the problems of the people in the world.

To Open game, Click download button then extacts the folder then click on the file named "In Need Of Food ver 2" to play game.
